name: Lockdown
overview: Primary Objectives must be locked in place with sustained presence. Secondary Objectives offer tools to make it possible.
primary_objectives: To score a Primary Objective, you must have controlled it for two consecutive rounds. When scored, it is worth 3 Victory Points.
secondary_objectives: Holding a Secondary Objective grants +1 Claim to the nearest friendly figure within 3" until the start of your next turn.
special_rules: Track continuous control with tokens or dice. If control is lost, the two-round timer resets.
